clear_bookmarks.doc_string: Remove(s) all bookmark(s) in the current document.

clear_fields.doc_string: Clears the fields of the currently active snippet.

clear_location.doc_string: Clears the 'Where' field in the Find in Files panel.

clear_recent_files.doc_string: Clears the list of recently opened files.

clear_recent_projects_and_workspaces.doc_string: Clears the list of recently opened projects and workspaces.

clone_file.doc_string: Creates a new view into the file.

args.name: add_to_selection
args.doc_string: Whether to add the opened cloned file as a part of the current group's multiselected sheet(s).

args.name: group
args.doc_string: The group number to open the cloned file to.

args.name: index
args.doc_string: The index within the group to open the cloned file to.

close_by_index.doc_string: Close a view of a group by index. A value of -1 means active group/view.

args.name: group
args.doc_string: The index of the target group.

args.name: index
args.doc_string: The index within the target group.

close_deleted_files.doc_string: Closes all views into deleted files.

args.name: group
args.doc_string: The index of the target group.

close_folder_list.doc_string: Removes all the folder(s) from the sidebar and hides it.

close_others_by_index.doc_string: Close all views of a group but the one identified by group and index. A value of -1 means active group/view.

args.name: group
args.doc_string: The index of the target group.

args.name: index
args.doc_string: The index within the target group.

close_selected.doc_string: Close all selected views in a group. A value of -1 means active group.

args.name: group
args.doc_string: The index of the target group.

close_to_right_by_index.doc_string: Closes all views of a group right of the one identified by index. A value of -1 means active group/view.

args.name: group
args.doc_string: The index of the target group.

args.name: index
args.doc_string: The index within the target group.

close_transient.doc_string: Closes all transient sheets and views.

close_unmodified.doc_string: Closes all unmodified views of a group. A value of -1 means active group.

args.name: group
args.doc_string: The index of the target group.

args.name: index
args.doc_string: The index within the target group.

close_unmodified_to_right_by_index.doc_string: Closes all unmodified views of a group right of the one identified by index. A value of -1 means active group/view.

args.name: group
args.doc_string: The index of the target group.

args.name: index
args.doc_string: The index within the target group.

commit_completion.doc_string: Inserts the selected completion into the text and closes the AC panel.

console_python_version.doc_string: Switches the python interpreter version in console input.

args.name: version
args.doc_string: The version of the python interpreter. Valid values are '3.3' or '3.8'.

context_menu.doc_string: Shows the context menu for the current view.

copy.doc_string: Copies the given selection(s) to the system clipboard.

cut.doc_string: Cut(s) the given selection(s) to the system clipboard.

convert_color_scheme.doc_string: Converts a color scheme from the older '.tmTheme' format to the newer '.sublime-color-scheme' format provided the active view is a '.tmTheme' file.

args.name: use_variables
args.doc_string: Indicates how the color values in the '.tmTheme' file has to be transformed. Valid values are 'hsl', 'yes', 'no'.

convert_syntax.doc_string: Converts a syntax file from the older .tmLanguage format to the newer .sublime-syntax format, provided the active view is a .tmLanguage file.

copy_path.doc_string: Copies the active view's file name to the clipboard, if the active view represents a file on disk.

cancel_find.doc_string: Cancels the Find panel, closing it.

close_pane.doc_string: Closes a group, given by its index. A value of -1 indicates the active group.

args.name: group
args.doc_string: The index of the target group.

copy_as_html.doc_string: Copies the contents of the current view as rich HTML to the system clipboard.

chain.doc_string: Runs a given set of command(s) sequentially, along with their argument(s) if any.

args.name: commands
args.doc_string: The list of commands and their respective arguments.

clear_missing_recent_projects_and_worksp.doc_string: Clears any deleted projects or workspaces from the session.

correct_spelling.doc_string: Corrects the incorrectly spelled word based on the incorrect word's region and the correction.

args.name: begin
args.doc_string: The integer that represents the beginning of the region that spans the incorrect word.

args.name: end
args.doc_string: The integer that represents the end of the region that spans the incorrect word.

args.name: correction
args.doc_string: The string to be placed as a correction for the incorrect word.

customize_theme.doc_string: Opens a new side by side window layout, with the current theme (default version) on the left & the user version on the right side. To make theme customization easier.

customize_color_scheme.doc_string: Opens a new side by side window layout, with the current color scheme (default version) on the left & the user version on the right side. To make color scheme customization easier.
